title: Bug 7752 - Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails.
OB: When attempting to export multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file using the 'Export' dialog window, an error occurs.
EB: If you name the files differently, for example, renaming 'foo.txt' in project 2 to 'foo2.txt,' the export process should complete without issues.
SR:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window.
2. Select both projects created earlier.
3. Provide a name for the zip file (e.g., test.zip).
4. Initiate the export to the zip file.

Results: An error message box appears, indicating problems during export. The details specify the file with the same name in project 2 as the issue.
